name: Casino Capers
description:
Note:
if web build gives issues, you can try the windows build. Download at bottom of page.

Welcome to Casino Capers! The goal is to get in, grab as much cash as you can, and get out before the goons catch you! Best of luck! 
Note: the vault starts locked, you need to find a large switch in the blue room in order to open it. To gain score, exit the casino after a successful heist. Robbing the vault adds a large score multiplier and lets you advance to the next level!

Controls:
WASD to move
Space to dodge 
Left click to fire pistol
Right click to fire grappling hook
